description: Single storey extension to western end of existing industrial unit.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). In accordance with the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan, 'Plan for the Environment' (2004). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing ref: P112 & P113, received on 26/03/2012, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.   Reason: In the interest of proper planning and to ensure that the development is carried out in accordance with the submitted details. | v | All external materials to be used in the proposed development shall match those shown on the approved drawings and as described on the planning application forms and Design and Access Statement, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the original dwelling house, in accordance with the Council's adopted UDP policies 4.1 of the adopted Ealing Unitary Development Plan 'Plan for the Environment' (2004) and policy 7.6 of the London Plan 2011.
